description: This file appears to be a C++ header defining the RemotePlugin class within the WPEFramework::Plugin::Rust namespace. It declares the RemotePlugin class, its constructors, destructors, methods, and relevant interface mappings, along with private helper functions and member variables. The file sets up the interface for a plugin that interacts with Rust code, including methods for initialization, communication, and lifecycle management.

classes.name: RemotePlugin
classes.description: This class acts as a plugin in the WPEFramework for interacting with Rust code, providing lifecycle management, communication, and callback mechanisms.

methods.name: RemotePlugin
methods.description: Constructor for initializing the RemotePlugin with configuration.

methods.description: Destructor for cleaning up the RemotePlugin instance.

methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell interface.

methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin, cleaning up resources.

methods.description: Returns information about the plugin.

methods.description: Increments the reference count for the plugin object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements the reference count for the plugin object.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the plugin with the provided shell.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin.

methods.description: Detaches a communication channel.

methods.description: Closes a channel by ID.

methods.description: Processes inbound messages or elements.
